description: {& The shade of the trees blocks out almost all sunlight, save a few
dusty beams illuminating the ground.  Some faint rustling can be heard
from within the overgrown underbrush, too faint to be anything
threatening.  Further on ahead the forest darkens, which is strange
because you are so near to civilization...
15085.name: In a forest

description: You are standing in a quaint chapel, built especially for Hanali to
perform her weddings in.  Large, expansive windows hand-crafted in a
myriad of colored glass line the north and west walls, A small, white
marble altar is faced by rows of mahogany and rosewood benches.
Flowers of every type and color in handblown glass vases adorn the
altar, along with a few tall, platinum candlesticks.  The flames of
the candles casts a warm glow over the room, creating a comfortable
and romantic atmosphere.
15076.name: A Grand Wedding Chapel

description: The path that you travel on is bairly visable.  A thick forest
surrounds you.  Trees that seem to reach to the sky are all you
notice as you gaze around the land.  Without warning you bang your knee
on a odd shaped log.
15098.name: Kossuth's Test Area Two

description: Now you're standing in a brightly lit reception area, decorated in
hues of yellow and gold.  Ornate golden tables are circled by
comfortable looking matching chairs, upolstered in yellow velvet.
Each table contains six place settings of delicate handmade china and
a golden champagne goblet.  Lilting harp music floats through the air,
creating a dreamy atmosphere.  An large area in the center of the room
has been cleared to serve as a dance floor, and above it hangs a
crystal chandalier, casting rainbows over the floor and walls.
15072.name: Main Reception Area

description: {&You have made your way into the master bedroom, which is {@H{2anali{&'s
{&private dwelling place.  In the center of the room is a large canopied
{4wa{$terb{4ed{&, draped in sheer pastel {2g{@ree{2n{& and {3y{#ello{3w {&fabric.  Windows on
almost all sides of the room let in sunlight throughout the day,
keeping the room warm and cheery.  On every table sits a vase filled
with sweetsmelling {3y{#ello{3w{& roses, filling the room with a pleasant
aroma.  To the north you see a door leading to a terrace, and to the
south leads back into the hallway.
15075.name: Master Bedroom

description: You are now standing in a dimly lit corridor, carpeted in an
elaborate handwoven rug and lit by a few candles on tall pillars.  The
walls are pale wood, covered with a few small tapestries depicting
beautiful elves sitting peacefully in a beautiful garden, much like
the one outside.  Ahead you see a dark rosewood door, closed yet
unlocked.  The smell of incense wafts through the air, apparently
coming from the room ahead.  Back behind you is the landing where you
began.
15078.name: Hallway

description: {&Ironically you find yourself in a comfortable looking chamber,
errily lit by reddish flames that seem to float in mid air.  {&A couch
upolstered in dark {1crimson{& velvet is on the far wall, and in front of
it is placed a {8black{& iron table.  On the table is an ashtray piled
high with cigarette butts and next to it a hand-blown glass pipe
rests, recently used.  The air is the room is perpetually hazy due to
the lack of ventilation.
15083.name: The Basement

description: You find youself in a small but comfortable sitting room decorated
in shades of lavender, light green, and grey.  The main attribute to
the room is a large tapestry hung on the north wall.  A plush couch is
placed in the center of the room, and to the side of it rests a table
with a chessboard perched on top, a game already in progress.  On the
east wall is a large window draped in some light green netting,
allowing the morning sunlight to filter through without causing a
glare.  The floor is created of the same tile as the front hallway,
only less ornate and using shades of grey and green.
15073.name: Secondary Reception Room

description: {&You are standing on a small path, overgrown with sweetsmelling
wildflowers and ivy.  All around you is forest, but to the north you
can see some light peeking through the trees.
15068.name: Path to a Cottage

description: You stand now in a lavishly decorated guest bedroon, furnished with
every possible amenity.  A large mahogany bed is placed in the center
of the room, covered in crimson and royal blue velvet blankets and
strewn with a variety of pillows.  Pretty stained glass lamps placed
on a dressing table shed a dim, yet warm light on the room.  The
carpet is dark red shag that tickles your bare feet when you walk upon
it.  A crystal chandellier hanging from the high ceiling casts tiny
rainbows all over the room.
15079.name: Guest Room

description: Finally you find yourself in a clearing.  The ground is covered
with a soft layer of moss and grass, and delicate ivy vines climb the
slender trunks of the surrounding trees, reaching up almost to their
highest branches.  The roots from the trees rise up out of the ground
to form natural places for you to sit and rest.  Small animals skitter
around, running from hole to hole, obviously disturbed by your
presence.
15088.name: {GA grassy clearing

description: After climbing the steep circular stairway you find yourself on a
small landing.  There is a hallway leading west and a door to the
north.  You try the handle of the door and find that it's locked
tightly.  Your only option is to go either back down the stairs or to
the west into the hall.
15074.name: Upstairs Hallway

description: {&You find yourself in a dark passageway that snakes through the
trees, bringing you further and further into this most unusual forest.
The leaves from the trees up above act as filters, lighting the area
with a green glow.  The foliage around you is so tightly packed that
you have very little choice but to turn around and backtrack towards
Hanali's cottate or continue even deeper into the grove.
15086.name: Further into the grove

description: You are standing on the front steps of a small dwelling.  Its is a
stone structure with ivy climbing the walls in abundance.  The front
door is painted a bright green to match the foliage growing out of the
numerous clay pots placed in nearly every window.  The front door
remains unlocked, encouraging all who come upon this place to enter
and make themselves at home.
15070.name: On the Front Steps

description: {&You are standing in the front hallway.  A small table sits on the
far wall, and perched upon it is a delicate glass vase filled with
{3y{#ello{3w{& roses.  The floor is what strikes your attention next.  Created
with painstaking detail, thousands of ceramic tiles are arranged to
depict a flock of snowy doves flying through a {$blue{& sky.  You see two
exits, one leading west into the reception room, the other north to
the garden.  A winding staircase leads up to the second story.
15071.name: Front Hall

description: You continue walking along the path, which has now taken you closer
to a clearing.  The trees that have been surrounding the walkway have
thinned out, allowing you to see what is up ahead.  It appears to be a
cottage of some sort, not very impressive but quaint nonetheless.  To
the east you hear some faint rustling, and you can't help but look to
see what it is.
15069.name: Path to a Cottage

description: {&You find yourself back in the dark, dreary forest.  Nothing about
this places makes you feel even a tad safe, but still you press on,
curious as to what exactly this forest holds behind it's dense, leafy
curtains.  You decide to press on and step further into the grove,
unsure of what you will encounter next.
15089.name: {gBack into the dark...

description: You find yourself standing on a small terrace that overlooks the
garden.  From here you can smell the flowers growing in abundance, and
hear the birds chirping in the trees.  A staircase leads down from
here to the garden down below.  On the terrace rests a delicate
rocking chair, in which Hanali often sits and daydreams and watches
the sun set.  An closed door leads into the house, but it seems to be
locked, to your dismay.
15077.name: Terrace

description: You are standing in a small but well stocked kitchen and pantry.  A
fireplace is topped by a metal spit, used for cooking meats of many
varieties.  Tall shelves hold plenty of food to feed even the most
ravenous traveler, and against the fall wall, under a curtained
window, sits a basin filled with fresh water.
15081.name: Kitchen

description: You are standing in a small washroom, placed here for weary
travelers to use.  The floor and walls are covered in small white
tiles.  In the corner sits a marble sink with delicate gold fixtures.
Guest towels hang from a bar attached to the wall.
15082.name: Bathroom

description: {&Water drips off the walls and falls into puddles that gather on the
ground of this seemingly abandoned cave.  The walls glisten as dim
light from the small entrance shines in and illuminates the strange,
silver flecked stone.  The air smells musty and damp, tinged with the
odor of rotting flesh, and you feel the urge to step back outside to
spare yourself from the rank, unfamilliar smell.  As your eyes adjust
to the light, a few things catch your attention.  Suprisingly a small
bed of flowers grows here, unrivaled in its beauty.  Unfortunately its
pleasant smell is overpowered by the stench of death and decay,
eminating from an unseen source.
15094.name: {&A dark {ycave

description: {&Deeper and deeper you go into the forest.  The light is almost
fully obscured here, and to your dismay you feel some unusual
creatures skittering around your feet.  A few rays of light shine in
from the south, giving you hope that there is some kind of clearing up
ahead.
15087.name: It's getting darker...

description: {&Here you stand in a small but beautiful garden.  At the far end of
{&this cheerful area is a large pond filled with {3go{#ldfi{3sh{& of all colors.
Along the border of the garden {@H{2anali{& has planted flowers, mostly
roses, that bloom throughout the year.  A few chairs are scattered
throughout the lush {@g{2reen{& grass, inviting all who come upon this patch
of nature to sit on them and enjoy the peaceful scenery.  In the
center of the garden is a fountain made of sparkling crystal that
glitters in the sunlight, casting rainbows in all directions.  A
stairway leads up to the second story terrace.
15080.name: Garden

15099.d_flags: D I will have my revenge!!!!!!!!~
description:
You only have time to catch a glims before he attacks.
All you can make out is the long hair on his head
and an evil smirk on his face.
15099.room_name: A hairy man is standing here, looking about
15099.name: Krakus~
15099.t_flags: T Today is a good day for you to die~

description: A handsome chef stands here, clad in robes that are dusty with flour. He only looks up for a moment and smiles at you before quickly going back to the task at hand.
15081.room_name: A handsome elven chef stands here, whipping up a grand feast
15081.name: A handsome elven chef~
15081.t_flags: T Welcome to the kitchen, what may i prepare for you?~

15083.room_name: A young man wearing white robes sits here smoking a bowl.
15083.name: Priest of Hanali~

description:
An adorable, fluffy chipmunk gathers nuts from the ground and
pauses to look up at you before going on its merry chipmunk way.
15068.room_name: A small {3chipmunk{9 scurries across the ground, looking for nuts.
15068.name: a {3chipmunk{9~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M RANDOM 15068 20~

15069.d_flags: D Hanali will avenge my death!~
description:
A beautiful young priestess with chin length crimson hair stands here, dressed plainly in a silken white robe tied at the waist with a golden cord.
Around her neck is a small emerald on a platinum chain, much like the one Hanali herself wears.
15069.room_name: A lovely priestess stands here, smelling the flowers.
15069.name: A priestess of Hanali~
15069.t_flags: T Welcome to the home of my goddess, Hanali. Please feel free to wander about as you wish.~

description:
A small tuft of fur runs around, teeth showing with drool running
from it's mouth.  You feel it's better that you DON'T pet him.
15070.room_name: A {3hamster{9 runs around, foaming at the mouth.. might be {1r{!a{#b{!i{1d{9.
15070.name: a {1r{!a{#b{!i{1d {3hamster{9~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M RANDOM 15070 20~
M DEATH 15072 100~
M FIGHT 15071 100~
